org.jpc.engine.embedded.database

Class IndexManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpc.engine.embedded.database.IndexManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MutableIndexManager

    public class IndexManager
extends Object
    A manager of term indexes. In the current implementation, indexes can only be defined for compounds having ground functor names.
    Author:
    sergioc
